snippet: The militant group Islamic State in Iraq and Syria is meant to weaken Iran and its allies, many Iranians say.
abstract: Many Iranians believe that Islamic State in Iraq and Syria has been concocted by United States to divide and conquer the energy-rich Middle East and to counter the growing influence of Iran in the region.
lead_paragraph: The militant group Islamic State in Iraq and Syria is meant to weaken Iran and its allies, many Iranians say.

headline.main: For Many Iranians, the ‘Evidence’ Is Clear: ISIS Is an American Invention
headline.print_headline: For Many Iranians, the ‘Evidence’ Is Clear: ISIS Is an American Invention

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
